messages.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends. - Martin Luther King Jr.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
Quote to ponder: "The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts." — Marcus Aurelius
Quote to ponder: "We suffer more often in imagination than in reality." — Seneca
Quote to ponder: "Man is disturbed not by things, but by the views he takes of them." — Epictetus
Quote to ponder: "When you arise in the morning, think of what a privilege it is to be alive." — Marcus Aurelius
Quote to ponder: "He who is brave is free." — Seneca
Quote to ponder: "If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present." — Lao Tzu
Quote to ponder: "It is not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters." — Epictetus
Quote to ponder: "The obstacle is the path." — Zen proverb
Quote to ponder: "What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create." — Attributed to the Buddha
Quote to ponder: "Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom." — Aristotle
Quote to ponder: "Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does." — William James
Quote to ponder: "The only way to have a friend is to be one." — Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote to ponder: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." — George Eliot
Quote to ponder: "All our life is but a mass of habits." — William James
Quote to ponder: "The only people who never fail are those who never try." — Ilka Chase
Quote to ponder: "Things do not change; we change." — Henry David Thoreau
Quote to ponder: "Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know." — Pema Chödrön
Quote to ponder: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." — Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote to ponder: "The greatest wealth is to live content with little." — Plato
Quote to ponder: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle." — Attributed to Plato
Quote to ponder: "Wherever you go, there you are." — Jon Kabat-Zinn
Quote to ponder: "Do not act as if you had ten thousand years to throw away." — Marcus Aurelius
Quote to ponder: "No man is free who is not master of himself." — Epictetus
Quote to ponder: "Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity." — Seneca
Quote to ponder: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." — Lao Tzu
